episodes.title: Growing Up In A Doomsday Cult #jworg #jehovahswitnesses #watchtower #exjw #religion #cults #cult
episodes.description:
I grew up in the doomsday cult of Jehovah's Witnesses. As a child, I had no idea what I was involved in. As I got older, however, it became clear -- but never as clear as when I finally exited the religion and found freedom.

#Religion #JehovahsWitnesses #Watchtower

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses Judicial Committees are ILLEGAL! #jworg #jehovahswitnesses #watchtower #exjw
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses have secret, closed judicial committees where witnesses are not allowed and recordings are not allowed, presided over by only 3 elders in the congregation. How does this compare to all of the Biblical examples of how trials should be conducted? This video examines the evidence.

episodes.title: The Biggest LIE Jehovah's Witnesses Will Tell You #jworg #jehovahswitnesses #watchtower #exjw REPOST
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses will never tell you that only members of their religion will survive Armageddon -- but that's exactly what their teachings state. This video demonstrates.

This is a repost of a video from the early days of my channel. Although the Watchtower has somewhat updated their doctrine, the bottom line remains: if you don't join or support the religion of Jehovah's Witnesses before "the end" comes, you're toast.

episodes.title: Misinformation & Conspiracy Theories: Questions For JWs #jworg #jehovahswitnesses #watchtower #exjw
episodes.description:
If you're one of Jehovah's Witnesses, I want you to know that I appreciate and agree with the article on JW.org, "Protect Yourself From Misinformation". However, I do have a few questions for you regarding what it says.

The Article:
https://www.jw.org/en/library/series/more-topics/conspiracy-theories-misinformation/

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses And The 1914 Fallacy #jworg #jehovahswitnesses #watchtower #exjw (REPOST)
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses claim 1914 as a pivotal year in Bible prophecy. How do they come up with this date, and does it stand up to scrutiny both from external sources and the Watchtower's own literature? 

This is a repost of one of my early videos. A number of people have asked me to repost some of my older videos so I'm going back through them and seeing what is still relevant.

episodes.title: Jehovah's Witnesses Don't Have to Shun Family Members Anymore!? #jehovahswitnesses #watchtower #exjw
episodes.description:
A clip from a 2017 Canadian Supreme Court case has resurfaced that seems to indicate that "normal family relations" can continue even if a person is disfellowshipped. But is that actually true?

episodes.title: JW Shunning vs Personal Boundaries - What's the difference? #jehovahswitnesses #watchtower #exjw
episodes.description:
Jehovah's Witnesses are taught to practice a strict form of shunning, which they would call their person choice based on their Bible-trained conscience. But is it really personal choice? This video examines the difference.

#Religion #JehovahsWitnesses #Watchtower

episodes.title: SHUNNING - A Mother's Love Denied #watchtower #jehovahswitnesses #exjw #humanrights #religion
episodes.description: A fictional tale of an all too real -- and too common -- event in the lives of Jehovah's Witnesses.
